welcome_message_body: Welcome to White Plains, a charming city known for its vibrant downtown, diverse dining options, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily domestic flights and is home to United Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, Republic Field Airport has a separate terminal with luxurious facilities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
